title: Bloomberg Markets: Schwartz on Biodiversity of Africa
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Schwartz on Biodiversity of Africa
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Rick Schwartz Ambassador San Diego Zoo Discussing their newest attraction Africa Rocks, spotlighting the amazing biodiversity found on the African continent.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
